meanings.definition: A person who creates handmade items or crafts.
meanings.sent1: The group of handicrafters displayed their beautiful creations at the fair.
meanings.sent2: I bought a lovely necklace from the local handicrafters.
meanings.sent3: The handicrafters joked that their fingers were tired from all the crafting.
meanings.sent4: The handicrafters' hands danced skillfully as they worked on their projects.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the handicrafters' intricate designs.

meanings.definition: The act of creating handmade items or crafts.
meanings.sent1: Handicrafters require patience and creativity to make their unique pieces.
meanings.sent2: The art of handicrafters adds beauty to our everyday lives.
meanings.sent3: The handicrafters' workshop was filled with colorful materials and tools.
meanings.sent4: The handicrafters' passion for their work shone through in every piece they made.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter filled the room as the handicrafters worked together.
